name: Necropolis (itch) (jehoz)
description:
A traditional roguelike for the GBA where you are a ghost.
Possess monsters, discover spells, and try to survive as you venture to the bottom of the Necropolis.

Made with libtonc for GBA Jam 2021

(wasn't able to implement everything I had planned due to some time constraints, so a post-jam version is in the works!)
